name: Happy BBQ VIP Edition - No IAP Game
name_original: Happy BBQ VIP Edition - No IAP Game
description:
【VIP Edition】
◆No IAP(In App Purchase)! If you download the game, you don't need to spend money in the game any more!

【Popular casual game】
◆Great time killer
◆Extremely entertaining
◆Super addicting
◆Pretty fun
◆Stress relief
◆Hard to put down
◆Can't stop playing

—————————Features—————————
【Simple Controls】
O(∩_∩)O The game is very simple.Smooth, polished touch interaction.

【Lovely Food】
(^ ▽ ^) Colorful UI.Each food has four kinds of cute expression. For example, smiling, happy and crazy.

【Challenge】
(＝^ω^＝) Game Center support.Connect with Game Center to find friends and compare high scores!The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?

【Happy BBQ】
(○^～^○)The player is the owner of a BBQ restaurant.According to the needs of the guests grilled food.

【More】
＼( ^▽^ )／ And..... more to come!

—————————Feedback—————————
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
